channel.title: I have a couple of questions hoping some1 will answee :)
channel.description: ok so i am wondering how 2 give some1 the right donator like wat code i need 2 add or somthin. i also want 2 know how 2 make some1 a co-owner. another question i have is how 2 change a weapon from being 2 handed 2 1 handed and vice versa. my last question is that when i add models then go into game and type add models it says added models#### but not the model i added it does the same number over and over again. thnks for any help

ok so wat do i change in it though? for the items?

item.title: I have a couple of questions hoping some1 will answee :)
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Alright, for the donator their’s a .java or .txt you also add their name to, along with changing it from “0” to “1” in their charater file.

For co-owner change their rights to 3 in their charater rights.

To change a wepon/armour to a differnert equaipment solt its in items.java.

The model thing, theirs usally more than 1 model for a item, also try to reload your client when you have done the “add model 'model number”

Hope this has helped.

Read full topic
